zh_cn.welcome_text:
欢迎你，{location} 场 {faction} 签到人员。

/importrsvp - 导入你所在阵营的特工
/checkin - 进行签到
/checkout - 进行签退
/help - 寻求帮助
zh_cn.checkin_choosefirstletter: 请选择签到 agent 的 ID 首字母。
zh_cn.checkin_error_checkedin: ⚠️ 特工 {agent} 已经完成签到。请选择一个不同的特工。
zh_cn.checkin_logdata:
请在消息框中写上 agent {agent} 目前等级、AP 和步行距离数据，以半角逗号 `,` 区隔。
例如：`16,40000000,2500`。大部分设备点击/长按示例可复制。
zh_cn.datainput_wronglevel: 等级错误，尝试重新输入。
zh_cn.datainput_error_inputstatus: 你目前正在登记 {agent} 的 AP，请先登记或发送 /cancelaprec 来放弃登记。
zh_cn.datainput_cancel: 已取消填充 AP/等级的状态。
zh_cn.checkout_choosefirstletter: 请选择签退 agent 的 ID 首字母。
zh_cn.checkout_error_checkedout: ⚠️ 特工 {agent} 已经完成签退。请选择一个不同的特工。
zh_cn.checkout_error_notin: ⚠️ 特工 {agent} 尚未进行签到，无法签退。

en_us.welcome_text:
Hello. You are {faction} organizer of {location} First Saturday.

/importrsvp - Import the list of agents same as the faction you are managing
/checkin - Check in an agent
/checkout - Check out an agent
/help - I need help
en_us.checkin_choosefirstletter: Choose the letter that at the beginning of agent name of the agent want to check in.
en_us.checkin_chooseagent: Choose the agent name of the agent want to check in.
en_us.checkin_error_checkedin: ⚠️ Agent {agent} already checked in. Choose a different agent.
en_us.checkin_logdata:
Write down the level, AP and Trekker (“Distance walked” in agent profile) data of agent {agent} in the message text field, and send it to me.
Separated with `,`, such as: `16,40000000,2500`. You can longpress or click the sample to copy it in most devices.
en_us.datainput_wronglevel: You may write a wrong level. Maybe you can check your input, and try to send again.
en_us.datainput_error_inputstatus: I am waiting for the data of agent {agent}. You may send it to me first, or send /cancelaprec to cancel it.
en_us.datainput_cancel: Ok, I am not waiting for agent data.
en_us.checkin_choosefirstletter: Choose the letter that at the beginning of agent name of the agent want to check out.
en_us.checkout_chooseagent: Choose the agent name of the agent want to check out.
en_us.checkout_error_checkedout: ⚠️ Agent {agent} already checked out. Choose a different agent.
